website_summaries.verdict: Fans of thermal carafes won't like the glass pot and hot plate, but those looking for excellent drip at a low price will sing the BrewSense's praises.
pros: The Braun BrewSense KF7150 creates drip coffee every bit as good as gourmet machines that cost three times as much
It's also compact, so it won't take up much space on your kitchen counter
cons: It uses a glass carafe and hot plate instead of a thermal carafe
Pouring the carafe too quickly causes spills and drips
The water tank has a small opening

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a Braun and I ordered it by accident when looking for another brand. This one caught my eye with it's features and it has not disappointed. It has a charcoal filter as well as a timed on and off feature. I like the descaling feature also for keeping the system in tip top shape throughout it's lifetime of use. I would buy this machine again.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD morning
customer_reviews.text: Sunday morning. Coffee maker came yesterday. Read instructions..rinsed well. Ran 12 cups clean water thru. Got up this morning, said to the coffee pot "alright big stuff...let's see what you got". Didn't change a thing except the coffee maker. Loaded it up and pushed the button and the machine started a-rumbling and a-bubbling. I liked that.. means stuff is happening. It kept making noise and I couldn't wait. I could see the steam coming out..good!!! Taste test finally came...guess what...it was unbelievably better..it truly was...I don't joke about coffee! oh..and the paper came early..now that's what I call a good sunday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jefff

customer_reviews.title: Ok Coffee pot, Stopped working after 1 year, NO Support from Braun
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the Braun for the time period it worked but it stopped working after 1 year. For a $100 coffee pot, I would have expected better. Braun offered a replacement and stated the replacement coffee pot would arrive with in 2-3 weeks. It's been 3 months and no replacement was sent. When I inquire about the status, there is no response their customer team. I would suggest you spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: buia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! The BMW of coffee makers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The BMW of coffee makers! Elegant compact design, quick and quiet brew cycle, easy to use controls for everything from coffee temperature to how long you want the warmer to stay active. (Don't know what the reviewer describing steam coming out the top is talking about. There are no openings in the top lid. The grid on it is just design...) This one will be my preferred coffee maker for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: NEXT!
customer_reviews.text: What's going on with Braun? Impossible to make a good cup of coffee in this coffee maker! I'm a gourmet cook, a coffee lover and always knew how to make a good cup of coffee until now. I use the same coffee as always but in this pot it's either too weak tasting and if I use more coffee then it's bitter. Perhaps it has something to do with the brewing temperature. Also the design of the water well is lousy. Braun? Are you out there?
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Betro

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but didn’t last long,got another new one
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker,looks great makes great coffee. It doesn’t have anything to notify you when it’s done brewing. Was up set since it died after 13 months ,Just stop brewing coffee and has a error code E01 which you can’t find any info on. If it had a sound for when it was ready and it hadn’t died I would have given it 5 stars. Now I have to see if Braun will warranty it. If not I will not buy another one. Update Braun sent a new one for the error E01. Took about 12 days to get the new one. Still has 11 months more warranty. This coffee maker has a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TOW

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing device.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this coffee maker for several months now, but it is NOT a true Braun. Perhaps Cuisinart purchased the name, but it is nothing like the Brauns I have always bought in the past. The biggest problem is that the coffee flavor is not comparable to any of the predecessor Braun models. The coffee taste is just as uninspired as that produced by Cuisinart makers, which this item exactly matches. As with Cuisinarts, one cannot accurately fill the water, because there is no external window to view the water height (all previous Brauns had this). One is supposed to guess water height by little platforms at 2 cup intervals -- just horrible.
customer_reviews.author: William Warhurst

customer_reviews.title: Self-Destructing Coffee Pot
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker just started smoking and burning in my kitchen. Error code E02. It's been off for 9 hours. Thank God we were awake and home, noticed the smell of burning plastic, and were able to toss this smoking, hissing coffee pot into the driveway. If it happened an hour later this coffee pot would have probably burned my house down on Christmas eve. Thanks Braun! I bought this coffee maker because I like Braun, but after this, I'm never letting another one of your products into my home. What kind of machine fails like this? It spontaneously gets hot enough to immolate itself after being off for 9 hours?
customer_reviews.author: Joel T

customer_reviews.title: Braun is typically makes a reliable coffee maker. However ...
customer_reviews.text: Braun is typically makes a reliable coffee maker. However this model began leaking from the bottom when I made more than 4 cups of coffee. I’ve only had it a couple of months and I’m unable to return for replacement post 60 days. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: 3 months old
customer_reviews.text: I'm just so disappointed. This was delivered on April 30th. Today is July 5th and the auto-off stopped working. The coffee will brew then turn itself off as soon as it's finished. It doesn't stay on for any period of time after brewing. So if you don't drink an entire pot of coffee within 30 minutes your coffee is cold. This was not an inexpensive coffee maker and I also expected a lot more out of the brand. This is the first Braun I've purchased and sadly will be the last. I just can't fathom a coffee maker having issues after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem the higher price is worth the extra "features"
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. The pot doesn't drip when I pour coffee, that's good. I was motivated to buy this particular maker as it has the warmer plate temperature setting. There's the regular setting and hot, but I don't feel it makes, or keeps, the coffee hotter than the basic Mr. Coffee maker that I had. There's also a regular or strong brew setting, but I don't notice a difference between the two brew settings. I feel like I paid the extra expense for a coffee maker for no particular reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received started smoking and then leaking water, so we asked for a replacement thinking that we just were unlucky. After using the second one for 3 days, we started seeing an error code, so we just returned it for a refund and purchased another brand. I've had Braun before and had good luck with them. Don't know whats wrong with this model or its just our bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Woodbridge Properties

customer_reviews.title: No side window for water level
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I ordered this that there is no side view to know how much water has been put in. There is something of a green staircase looking thing inside the water reservoir to judge the water level. I normally make either 5 or 7 cups and it's pretty tough to see those amounts. I prefer to use the sink hose to put water in rather than the carafe to keep the coffee make clean longer. So, the failing is more on me for not knowing what I was buying, rather than a shortcoming of the coffee maker. Everything else about it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ankrum

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after one month. Avoid Braun. They have no customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible coffee maker. Started giving an error E01 only after a month of use. The manual tells you to call customer service to resolve the issue but that's next to impossible. Unless you have countless hours to wait on hold just to speak to someone who doesnt know anything about the product or the issue. I will never buy another Braun product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas Atanacio

customer_reviews.title: Broken Carafe from Braun
customer_reviews.text: I was just getting ready to make coffee for tomorrow morning, pouring water into the carafe, the entire bottom of carafe broke in my hand..very poor quality..Carafe has been gently used, and cleaned, just bought in April from Amazon, attempted to call Braun, waited over 45 minutes for another recording, all agents are busy.. Amazon has replacement carafe’s for $50.00 through a third party, do not buy Braun Type 3106, Minutes del # KF 7150, or KF 7170
customer_reviews.author: Annie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers packaging
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Braun! Had to purchase another! Best coffee maker over many I have owned! Stores in my area do not sell them so I found one here through Amazon. When it arrived, the coffee pot was shattered into pieces. Returned for another immediately hoping that the pot will be packaged much better this time when it arrives. Maybe protect the glass pot with foam insulation? Absolutely no secure for glass and no mention on the box “fragile”. Just very poor manufacturing packaging.
customer_reviews.author: mark baron

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality coffee. All sorts of programmable options including shut off times. Very happy with this purchase. Update six months later. Minor issue. It appears the lettering on the buttons that control the unit are fading/wearing away, particularly the “auto off” button. Not pleased. I take very good care of my coffee makers. 7 months in & it appears the hotplate is no longer heating. Not just hotplate problem. There was an odd electrical smell while brewing. Now lights are on, but no functionality. It’s trash.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic exterior warped on me
customer_reviews.text: Decided to spend a little more money on what I thought was going to be a decent coffee maker, but this was a disappointment. Within a month of using this, the top plastic lid had warped, making it hard to seal the top and prevent tons of steam from escaping. Even when I tried to adjust the top cover before brewing, somehow it would still end up out of place. A cyclical problem now - escaping steam warps lid, which prevents proper closure, which results in escaping steam. See picture. This is not acceptable and I’ll be replacing this coffeemaker with something else.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in October, 2018 and stopped working in July, 2019 after once daily use (error code E01). Error code requires call to “Braun Customer Service” per user manual. Several calls to “customer service” resulted in long “please hold” messages for over 15 minutes per call listening to elevator music and someone telling me how important my call is. Disappointed with both the product and absolute lack of service.
customer_reviews.author: Maude

customer_reviews.title: Buy a MR. COFFEE!
customer_reviews.text: “Clean” light came on one week after using. It never went off even after multiple cleanings. It was very slow to begin with and got slower. After months of dealing with its quirks, we ordered a simple $26 Mr. Coffee. No bells or whistles; just really fast, good coffee. I did order a plug in timer to prevent that trip back to the house because I couldn’t remember whether I shut it off or not. Sometimes less is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Silentgrayfellow

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because my old one had lived a long, useful life. And, with almost exactly two years in, it simply stopped working this morning. It will not heat up. The button work and show up green. The clean button is on and I had started the cleaning process with product purchased for that purpose. But no luck! Very unhappy as I believe the warranty is two years. I do not plan to replace a $70 coffee maker every two years. I can go to Walmart and pick one up for $20 that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality and NO BEEPING
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent coffee machine. The 1-4 cups setting works very well, and the coffee is quite hot. There is no beeping noise ever on this machine, something I love. Also, the carafe lid flips open for easy rinsing, so you don't have to take it off to clean. The machine feels fairly solid. I've used the self-cleaning cycle once and that worked fine. I liked that you could set the sensor for your particular water hardness.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Good Cup o' Joe
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our old Cuisinart brewer. It took a bit (not long) to figure out how to set the clock, the auto-on time, and the auto-off time. The one thing that's annoying is that the same button has to be pressed repeatedly to change the settings, and if the settings change often enough the label on the button begins to disappear. They need to to a better job with that.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and love it. I finally have hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and love it. I finally have hot coffee. Bought a Cusinart 2 months ago (not from Amazon) and already the switch broke. Right from the get go it would only brew at 155* It costs as much to ship it back and with the handling charge from Cusinart I decided to just throw it away. More poorly made junk to go in the landfill. The temperature of the Braun comes out at 186. I like the adjustable brew strength and plate warmer. Also, the pot doesn't drip when pouring. 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We have been extremely happy with this coffeemaker. A big selling point was the ability to adjust the burner temp to keep coffee hot cup after cup as well as adjusting the brew strength. The heavy duty spring mechanism allows one to interrupt the brewing cycle to pour a cup of coffee without any dribbling. We had been having problems with numerous coffee makers where the grounds end up floating above the filter and then plugging the brewing process....making a big mess. This has not happened once with the Braun. We think the design of the brewing basket has prevented this from happening. We would buy this coffee maker again.
customer_reviews.author: C R Boulay

customer_reviews.title: Always spills when pouring coffee
customer_reviews.text: From day one we could not pour coffee without it spilling all over the counter. We have to open the lid, pour very slowly, and even with that, must pour over the sink to keep the spilling contained. It was so well reviewed in many ways that I wanted to find a way to make it work, but I think this will have to move on to donation.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Darling

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two years!
customer_reviews.text: I use it occasionally when my brother visits, about once or twice a year! After two years, the the filter basket stopped draining completely and would leave the basket full of water as soon as the brewing process stopped! I've ordered a replacement basket and will add to this comment if it works. Update: Braun asked me to contact their customer support but they haven't been able to figure out why it isn't working so far! They are currently looking into it.
customer_reviews.author: William Ruf

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! PROS: · MODERN APPEAL · PERFECTLY DESIGN RAIN SHOWER-DRIP SYSTEM · DELICIOUS COFFEE · 12 CUP GLASS CARAFE · 1-4 CUP SETTING · COMPACT FOOTPRINT · LCD DISPLAY IS A BEAUTY · GOLD TONE PERMANENT FILTER · DECENT PRICE · TRUSTED MANUFACTURE Cons: · Wished it would have arrived in an Amazon box ( I only mentioned this because it came in it's original box. And while it had a fair amount of good cushion inside to protect it - I'd hate for someone to steal this from your front porch if they spot it ) Overall, I highly recommend this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes up short on the little things
customer_reviews.text: Makes decent coffee, but I liked my old Mr. Coffee better. The Braun always drops a little coffee on the burner which I hate. Gotta move very slow to prevent that. The final stages of percolating is louder too, almost wants to blow the lid up. The lid is heavy and the design to lift it up to add water forces u to use two hands because the lift notches are on the sides, not a single notch front and center. There also is no alarm to tell u when coffee is done or when burner turns off. I won’t buy this version again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Raihala

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sleek good looking coffee maker, but when you pay $99, you expect more. The main problem is that when you pick the lid up, it doesn't open smoothly and it makes a click as if it doesn't fit properly. I tried separating the lid and assembling it again and it still does that. I called the customer service and I was told this is how it's designed :( The other problem to me is the fact that you can't tell how much water is in the container. The measurement is on the green steps inside the machine and very hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: maryam

customer_reviews.title: Makes a really good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers say the only downside to this is a lack of a window to see how full you are filling the water, but since I am tall I can easily see down into the reservoir and don't have a problem seeing how full the water is. Also I most often make a full pot of coffee so I dont worry about it. Fillerup!!! The coffee is amazing from this machine. Nice strong hot coffee every time. It brews fast and automatically shuts off. Everything I want in a coffee maker. I'll never go back to cheap coffee machines again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Am happy Braun have returned to small home appliances
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. Am happy Braun have returned to small home appliances. Only downside, the measuring indicator are located inside of tank, which is difficult for short people to see. Also, like fact it does not have a high pitched sound advising water or coffee is ready!
customer_reviews.author: Up North

customer_reviews.title: Use the filter to keep grounds out of the boiler.
customer_reviews.text: I fill it with the sink sprayer, but you have watch and listen to see when it’s full (there’s a green staircase that shows, but it’s inside.) My wife uses the carafe to fill it and doesn’t have to watch, but I still think my way is better. It does get grounds in the reservoir, so every month or two I hold it sideways over the sink and spray out the reservoir, then take out the filter, spray it out again *then* run the “cleaning” cycle with citric acid or vinegar. (Then put in a new filter.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Braun
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the $. Bought this after returning a different/cheaper brand. This Braun coffee maker feels solid and works great. Some people here complain about filling the water, but I don't have an issue with it. That's the way it was growing up. Just use the scale on the jar and then fill the coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: New here.

customer_reviews.title: This model works beautifully. I use the auto start so my coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: This model works beautifully. I use the auto start so my coffee is waiting for me, freshly brewed each morning. I use the "strong" option and the coffee is full flavor without being bitter. The machine is easy to clean and looks great on the kitchen counter. The previous reviews online helped me choose this model and I'm glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original Braun coffee pots
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the original Braun coffee pots. Difficult to get all the water in to it if you use the pot. The "clean" button goes on by itself and you can not turn it off. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bob vanderoef

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker is exactly as described - all around good quality and easy to use. The only complaint I have is with the metal fine filter. I used it a couple of times and when back to just using paper filters. The metal fine filter is difficult to clean - hard to remove the coffee ground without putting it under running water. I have a septic tank and don't want too much material going into the tank.
customer_reviews.author: asooner

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker lasted about two years. When it died I looked up the manufactures warranty and Braun customer service was outstanding in that they honored their warranty right away. I was able to use my purchase record from Amazon and submit that to Braun and received a new replacement. Once you find your preferred strength, this machine nails it every time. Hint, learn to use the strong brew option to save coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: A Real Cup of Coffee, Quietly!
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is this coffee maker does not beep 3 times when the brewing is done or the 2 hour timer is done or when I turn it back on! That was my motivation and it is a success. The added features make it a top notch coffee maker: ,making and keeping the coffee temperature higher, filtering the water adds to the flavor, extending the turn off time to up to 4 hours, cone filters are awesome keeping the grounds out of my cup and, if I haven't mentioned this yet, it doesn't beep!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Finally great coffee at home!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 2 keurig machines and one off brand kcup machine, I decided to go back to a traditional coffee maker. Based on previous reviews I chose the Braun and love it so far. I couldn't ask for a better cup of coffee at home. It is easy to set for the morning and the burner keeps it hot for as long as you want. It comes with a gold filter but we use the paper ones because our coffee is ground fine. The gold filter left residue at the bottom as a result.
customer_reviews.author: NMG

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional and great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: We’re french press kids but have found ourselves entertaining folks quite a bit over the last two years. We finally broke down and purchased this bad boy to account for all the added coffee drinkers. We’ve had it about a month. So far so good. Great taste, perfect temp, keeps it warm for hours. Easy to load. Not sure on cleaning. It has a light that comes on when it needs to be cleaned but that hasn’t happened yet. I would imagine it’s just a simple vinegar rinse through. I’ll update again if I’m surprised!
customer_reviews.author: hjackson

customer_reviews.title: Very slow and bitter coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my bunn only because it’s 12 cups. After using it every day for a month I’m going back to bunn. Coffee is bitter even though I grind it daily and it’s very slow. Perhaps I’m just spoiled but I wouldn’t recommend this coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: kenneth barlow

customer_reviews.title: The dreaded error code E02
customer_reviews.text: Did not live up to Braun reputation for quality. KG7150 lasted less then 11 months before E02 appeared and coffee brewing ended. I've spent an hour trying to reach Braun Customer Service. Back to the percolator!! Someone should notice the number of respondents with this error problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No help from Braun
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker broke and after several hours on the phone and after twice descaling the unit with the kit they sold me for $14.95, it was still broken. Amazon took care of me but Braun didn’t. No more Braun products for me!
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Worth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the styling primarily. Just completed a kitchen makeover and was looking for something with some style beyond the standard coffee maker. What i have found is that the coffee I make now tastes better and I can adjust the "keep warm" temperature such that my third or fourth cup of coffee does not taste over-cooked. I bought another for a birthday gift for my son. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stutts

customer_reviews.title: Caught Fire (internal electrical fire fried the unit)
customer_reviews.text: unit does not work, electronics melted and fried the unit.
customer_reviews.author: SDDB54

customer_reviews.title: Great overall quality coffee maker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really feel that this coffee maker, for the price, is very good overall. Easy to set up, easy to use, easy to clean and makes a full pot of coffee quickly too. My only issue is that over time the labels/print on the buttons you use to program things fades. On my previous identical machine the auto timing button just stop working all together after about 1 1& 1/2 years. Overall very good coffee maker compared to 5 others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mmagirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use coffeemaker that I was very happy with, until it stopped working after one month. The company required proof of purchase and my sending them the cut off cord before they would replace it. I am hoping this was a fluke and that the replacement will give me years of good service. I really like the idea of the replaceable water filter and the metal brew basket.
customer_reviews.author: ijoyl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Makes great coffee too.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up. Nothing complicated about it at all, in fact I didn't even refer to the directions. Minimal parts involved. Basically all you're removing is the filter basket for cleaning and of course, the coffee pot itself. Unit looks great on your coffee/toaster bar.
customer_reviews.author: bwdan2003

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker and all it's features. However It did cease to function after around 2 months. Braun sent me a new one after I cut the cord from the defective one and mailed it to them. Their customer service was first rate. Since that time, around 6 months, it has functioned perfectly. As long as it keeps working I am well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great Braun coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Braun drip coffee maker. Coffee stays hot tastes great. I had a Ninja which only lasted 1 1/2 yrs & I wasn't happy with the coffee flavor. Don't hesitate on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjo H.

customer_reviews.title: Great HOT & Strong Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: If you like "hot" coffee, this is the pot for you, even if yo like 'strong' coffee. Great features to set temperature of coffee (after the brew) and the strength during brewing. The charcoal filter system that comes with, honestly did not see that when I purchased. Purchased Braun on my 24 year history (dropped pot and cried) ... EZ to set for start/stop automatically, but had to read the instructions to learn how to start earlier (push on/off button, then brew button!)
customer_reviews.author: KC Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Carafe is made of glass
customer_reviews.text: After seven months we discovered the bottom of the carafe was cracked. We tried to order a replacement carafe, however it is out of stock everywhere. It appears this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walsh

customer_reviews.title: easily to pour into water reservoir and basic clean design
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my beloved Krupps, which was so simple and brewed so well but that model is not longer made. It had a big, easily to pour into water reservoir and basic clean design. This new one is really a 4.5 stars. The reservoir could be a little bigger. And the watchamcallit where the grounds go could be bigger. If you're making an 8 cup pot, once the water drips it the grounds go up to the very top. If you were to brew up to 12 I imagine you'd find grounds in your carafe. But other than than, simple design and clean look and good coffeee. Love it!.
customer_reviews.author: Woogie

customer_reviews.title: I hate that!
customer_reviews.text: 10/22/2017 the brewer just gave up! It got a clean button pressed and and stuck on, and won't go off. Nothing works! Nothing. 6 months warranty...I bought it 7 months...I hate that!!! You should test them long enough. I'm frustrated with this purchase. Just telling how I feel. Merle Gifford
customer_reviews.author: Merle E. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee but short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker. It makes the best tasting drip coffee that we have found. However there is one major drawback that knocks its stars down significantly. We are on our third machine in in five years. Our first machine was replaced by the company for free after 1.5 years. The second machine lasted longer but eventually failed due to the same error. If you buy it make sure you research the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker overall
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee maker overall, looks nice on the counter. Lots of good settings with being able to control brew strength, heat, and a 1-4 cup setting. I don’t like where you fill it from or how you are supposed to tell how much water is in there but not many coffee makers do make that easy for some reason. I’ve been using it for several months now and it’s working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fred K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. Really makes a great cup of coffee. I don't use all the frills. I just needed one that fit where I needed it and made good coffee. Been a while wince I had a Braun, well worth it! There is only 1 con for me it, it is not easy to pour the water into the machine. You REALLY have to be careful or it will spill into where you put the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kirasheba

customer_reviews.title: Does not make good coffee
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much coffee, even freshly ground, we could not get a robust cup of coffee out of this maker. We tried several times and were disappointed every time. Otherwise, we liked the machine, looked good and easy to read settings but just weren't satisfied. We returned the machine.
customer_reviews.author: C Weave

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Clean, and then clean again!
customer_reviews.text: It makes coffee which it is supposed to do. However, the "clean" light has come on twice in the past two months. I had a cuisinart previously and I had to clean it every six months or more. My water is great, so I think it is just a bug in the machine. Very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: DefinitelyNotEmeril

customer_reviews.title: Some really poor design features.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and durable but not happy. Coffee is not hot enough. But real killer is ridiculous water gauge. Placed in back inside reservoir the gauge looks like a little set of steps with numbers indicating number of cups. Problem is that one cannot read this gauge without shining a flashlight on it. The numbers are just raised with no contrasting color so they are almost invisible. Do designers actually try to use the things they design? Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kastin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: This one works very well .. I’m glad I got it . Automatic programming is very easy to set up . The only down side is , it’s hard to fill up with water because it’s placed in back and you have to look from top how full you going to make it. Other then that it’s a great Coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: victoria s.yunker

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this simple: This thing brews coffee exactly how I want it when brewing for only myself. I docked a star for two things that may bother no one else: 1) I shouldn't have to push multiple buttons to start brewing, especially when I pre-loaded the water & filter before I toddled off to bed. 2) I hate cone filters. Thanks for including the excellent "forever" filter, but I still use paper filters as well ... and I really HATE it when the buggers collapse, strewing wet grounds through out the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker was great until the clean button came on. Let it run its cleaning cycle and it never worked since.
customer_reviews.author: xamazonx

customer_reviews.title: Not guite perfect but Almost
customer_reviews.text: It has a pause feature to get cup of coffee before complete but I have found to get hot coffee u need to finish brewing let set for another 5 min. Then u will have nice hot coffee. Love the 1-4 c button, love the charcoal filter. New haven't cleaned yet and. I didn't set up for automatic come on. I don't do something everyday at same time. I set temp on hi and flavor on bold. Otherwise it's new and can't give full review.
customer_reviews.author: deborah smith

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting very tired of the expense and waste involved with the Keurig brewing system. This Braun coffee maker is very nice and convenient. We are really enjoying our coffee and feel like there is a lot less waste.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne C

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good cup of coffee at the right temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Braun coffeemaker I've always used a Bunn but decided to try something different. I like the coffeemaker it is easy to program makes great coffee. The only drawback to it is the pot. The spout is not deep enough that so many times I spill water pouring it in to make coffee and spill it pouring into my cup as well. The only other thing I wish is that the water reservoir was larger and easier to get to. Now it's in the corner and opening is small. I'd recommend this coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rene16

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this coffee maker better is if it just had an on/off switch to start and stop the brewing cycle like the Braun coffee makers I had in the 90's. I don't need a lot of bells and whistles to make a pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, quick and clean. And easy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this coffee maker, both the look on the counter, as well as details, such as the day-glo ladder inside the fill tank which shows how much water is in the tank. The drip-stopper on the filter unit actually seems to work, unlike many coffee makers I've used when you sneak an early cup, and also the carafe pours dribble free! The control layout is well done, and programming the clock and Auto-On and Auto-Off are simple. IDK if the BOLD or 1-4 cup settings do much, but in this price range, its a really nice coffee maker! Quiet and essentially steam free while brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Tarquin Ross

customer_reviews.title: 2 Uses?
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a family event at our home. We got the first pot done fine but the second gave us an E error message which can only be fixed by calling the manufacturer. On a weekend? Put it away tried again another day and the same thing. So 2 pots of coffee for whatever price we paid... never mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The maker lasted less than 60 days then quit. Had to get another coffee maker "QUICK" as it was my sons wedding day and we were having about 40 people over later that night. Needless to say customer service is only open M-F and this was on a Saturday. No help on the website at all. I would stay away from Braun wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M

customer_reviews.title: Failed within 3 years - error code E01
customer_reviews.text: Great cup of coffee but it failed yesterday. Bought from amazon less than 3 years ago. Cheaply made I guess. Last Braun product I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kika

customer_reviews.title: Three strikes you're out
customer_reviews.text: Our third one under warranty just showed a E02 code. No more Braun, although it did make good coffee while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Code Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: The cone shaped basket seems to improve the flavor of the coffee vs the coffee maker I had previously (a Mr. Coffee) that had a flat bottomed basket. Also like the features that are available with this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Belenus

customer_reviews.title: Makes Superb Coffee,no water gauge!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS UNIT MAKES EXCELLENT COFFEE. This unit meets my expectations, except it is not possible tell how much water is in the tank. You need to measure the quantity. NO VISUAL INDICATOR AND FOR THE PRICE BRAUN COULD HAVE ADDED A GAUGE. Don't be so cheap braun, add feature to the next design!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Burn plate defective
customer_reviews.text: A very attractive machine. Easy to use. The first cup is very good. Buy the hot plate burns the coffee before I get my next cup. Yes, even on low. I cannot return it because its a hassle finding a Ups station open. Guess I will have to wait until this virus thing is over.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Another good Braun product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very pleased with my new Braun coffeemaker. Only one slight problem and that is the difficulty in knowing how much water you are putting into the machine. It's a bit difficult to see the water line measurements. That difficulty, however, is far outweighed by the excellent coffee that the machine produces!
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Happy sister! Happy brother!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister. She's very happy and pleased with it. This is the BEST coffee maker she's ever owned. She likes the options that it offers. She's noticed the coffee tastes more flavorful. Easy and convenient to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LorenzoJohnMares48

customer_reviews.title: Not as reliable as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model before and loved it. This time, for some reason about every 4th or 5th time it simply heats the water but doesn't pass it through the coffee grounds so I end up with hot water and no coffee. A second try usually makes it work, but the overall feeling now is "not reliable." And returning it is too cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: mission furniture fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee maker, good value.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking coffee maker, and very easy to use. It brews really quickly and keeps the coffee hot. For the money, it is an excellent coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: sdnelson11

customer_reviews.title: Programmable length of life of electronic device
customer_reviews.text: Stop brewing exactly after one year of using it. I checked thermostats, heater and all cables - all looks like new - so my conclusion is that length of life is programmed in control chip on pcb
customer_reviews.author: MIROSLAW WYNAR

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't *need* a new coffeemaker. I needed *this* coffeemaker. When my last Braun died after many, many, years of service, no U.S.models were available. Had to buy something else and despised it. Now, eighteen months later, Braun is back and I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: clm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work anymore
customer_reviews.text: We thought we were paying for a better quality coffee maker. After a few months of use, this is a useless piece of junk. It basically stopped getting the water through and it just sits in the filter. So no more Braun for us.
customer_reviews.author: H. Caspi

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this. I purchased one and it started reading an error code. The replaces it and the new one did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Elevator Bob

customer_reviews.title: Makes hot and good coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I took away one star because for me, trying to look INSIDE the coffeemaker to determine how much water I put in is an act of Congress. Not at 6 a.m. makes good and very hot coffee.
customer_reviews.author: roaddog90

customer_reviews.title: Died after 23 months!
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to get used to. Overly complex time setting features. Loses it's setting during p power outage. Mine died aft er 23 months. Braun USED to have quality products.
customer_reviews.author: KURT H LINDGREN

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker!
customer_reviews.text: The Braun KF7150 Brew Sense Drip Coffeemaker is awesome! Would have received five stars if the numbers inside the water tank were in a contrasting or different color. Something like this 2️⃣ 4️⃣ 6️⃣ verses ⬜️ ⬜️ ⬜️. That was the only thing keeping me from giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: VERY poor customer service and warranty compliance
customer_reviews.text: Paint on carafe heater unit peeled (7 mo use). Braun determined the unit needed to be replaced. In order to do so, we had to cut off the cord and send them a picture before they would send replacement. We were 10 days w/o a coffee maker. Even worse, the warranty is based on the faulty units purchase date and not on the new unit. Go with a manufacturer that stands behind the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have a Braun again and it is all ...
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have a Braun again and it is all I had hoped for. The machine is unbeatable making the perfect pot of coffee. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker. Price is right, looks great , makes an excellent pot of coffee. Set up is easy. Has all of the features most people need and that are in higher end coffee makers.
customer_reviews.author: garym

customer_reviews.title: Nice features but a removable water tank would be better
customer_reviews.text: Not in love with the coffee filter/water tank design. The water tank is open to coffee grounds and grounds seem to get everywhere when filling the filter basket. I feel like they may settle into the bottom of the water tank over time. I do like the charcoal filter and the brew timer—it’s pretty easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Freely admit I am a percolator fan but did some research and arrived at this as a replacement for my percolator. Coffee is bitter in comparison and lukewarm. Long live the percolator.
customer_reviews.author: A. SLOAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product (a year after purchase)
customer_reviews.text: It's like a German coffee pot: clean and simple looking but you will NEED TO READ THE INSTRUCTIONS. A good drip coffee maker and we have really enjoyed it. It's lasted over a year without issue and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moote

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker! It took me several tries to figure out my prefered coffee grounds to water ratio, but the bold setting is really helpful. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: No dribbles!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good coffee maker. Programmable, strength & temperature selectable, and no dribbles (unlike most other coffee makers we've had). And it makes a good pot of coffee! Update: After 18 months in service, an "E02" message appeared on the screen and an acrid smell like electronics burning took over the kitchen. The unit had a 2-year warranty and was replaced promptly by Braun. However, the new unit carries only the remaining 6 months of the original warranty. We're assuming this failure was an aberration so we're sticking with the 5-star rating. For now.
customer_reviews.author: crabman

customer_reviews.title: great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Researched for awhile and decided on this one. It's very well made and coffee comes out a decent temperature. I would like it a little hotter but, that's just my preference. Easy to program to brew automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Braun coffee maker lasted over twenty years. I was willing to pay more because of this experience, despite the KF-7000 no longer being German-made (Made in China). I have owned it for 3 years and enjoyed the coffee maker very much, until I noticed some corrosion on the hot plate. It turns out that the spot had actually rusted completely through. Very disappointing that this product is falling apart after such a short time. I only use it once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. Looks great, makes wonderful coffee and it's super easy to use. Only drawback is that at the end of the brewing cycle - it sounds like a freight train. Surely there's a way to optimize the water pressure needed and be quieter. Even with the loudness, I'd buy again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: sandtrapper

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee maker. It's user-friendly, has a sleet stylish appearance and makes an awesome pot of coffee. Highly recommend. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Smolik

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to program. Not very intuitive at all. Still not sure why it didn't work the first 7 times and not sure why it finally did.
customer_reviews.author: VK - Ohio

product_meta.title: Braun KF7150BK Brew Sense Drip Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel and Black Finish.
product_meta.description: Style:KF7150BKOnce the aroma of fresh-brewed coffee fills the kitchen, a cup of goodness awaits with the Braun Brew Sense 12-cup Drip Coffee Maker, model KF7150. This model features a stainless steel and piano black finish with extra wide display. The Pure Flavor system brews your coffee at exactly the right temperature and brewing time to extract the best flavor and aroma.
feature_bullets: Pure flavor brewing system : Consistent great flavor from the first to last drop
Fully programmable: 24 hour clock, auto on/off and 1 4 cup functions
Bold strength selector Allows you to enjoy your coffee regular or bold just the way you like it
Extra Large Digital Display User friendly control panel with LED indicators and easy to read buttons
Consists of lcd display. Parts are dishwasher safe. Anti Drip System Lets you pause and pour mid brew with virtually no mess

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,474 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
